Text: ya idiot,,how many "Blade Runners" are you planning to post on this site shit head?

amouly, there are seven different official cuts of this film, and they are all of interest to fans of this film as this film has a very interesting history. Getting some of these cuts in a higher quality version is very rare. Kudos to the uploader for uploading this. It's nice to have a 1.3x gig version of the international theatrical cut. This is my favorite version anyway. Lots of different cuts of this film, see the wiki article here:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Versions_of_Blade_Runner
There are also some very interesting fan cuts of note which are worth viewing and of interest.
